subtitleNullable: Acceleration data for 15 horse rides annotated with stand, walk, trot and canter
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Data from various rides recorded with the motion sensor in smartphones (both android and iOS) with the phone in the rider's pocket. Data collected with Equilab, the horse training app https://equilab.horse

Rides **15**
Annotated time **573 min**

Stand **39 min**
Walk **320 min**
Trot **150 min**
Canter **65 min**

### Content

Time column -> Seconds since start of training
Acceleration column -> The acceleration in the up/down direction
Activity column -> Activity labels (stand, walk, trot and canter). Also "unknown" if the activity is not known or unclear at an interval.

![Chart](https://storage.googleapis.com/project-847196107745527358.appspot.com/public/chart.png)

### Inspiration

Based on the acceleration data predict the gait of the rider.
